message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you today.  I think it would be incredibly useful for you. I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  However, $120 is quite a bit below its value. Could we settle at $180? I'm confident you won't regret it!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer $150. This is my top price, can you accept it?
